collectible.title: Tharja's Hex
collectible.subtitle: A grimoire of dark magic
collectible.text: After watching you masturbate, Tharja was too excited and left her spell tome at the inventory. The power of dark magic is now in your hands.
collectible.unlock: As a male player, let Tharja see what she wants to see.

collectible.title: Dark Energy
collectible.subtitle: Momentum p, Dark Energy
collectible.text:
Einstein's relativity Meets Heisenberg's uncertainty Singularity, infinity Momentum p, Dark Energy
After winning a game against Tharja, you absord her magics.

collectible.title: Anna's Photograph
collectible.subtitle: A Lewd Promotional Scheme
collectible.text: Anna's not only an esteemed merchant, but she's also one hell of a photographer. This is just one of many photos given to you to help with nightly stirrings. Oh, there's a note on the back... it reads: "Looking for the password? Check my credits!"
collectible.unlock: Have Anna lose her panties while Tharja is nude. (This collectible contains clues for Anna)
